CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.Weighted_Average_Start_Date__c)), IF( DATEVALUE(Went_to_Ready_to_Ship_Date__c) < SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.Weighted_Average_Start_Date__c, 'Closed Before Expiration', IF( DATEVALUE(Went_to_Ready_to_Ship_Date__c) = SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.Weighted_Average_Start_Date__c, 'Closed On Expiration', IF( DATEVALUE(Went_to_Ready_to_Ship_Date__c) > SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.Weighted_Average_Start_Date__c, 'Closed After Expiration With Back Billing', '' ) ) ), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(License_Start_Date__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__RenewedContract__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Went_to_Ready_to_Ship_Date__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.EndDate)), IF( (License_Start_Date__c = DATEVALUE(Went_to_Ready_to_Ship_Date__c)) && (DATEVALUE(Went_to_Ready_to_Ship_Date__c) = SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.EndDate + 1), 'Closed On Expiration', IF( (License_Start_Date__c = SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.EndDate + 1) && (SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.EndDate + 1 > DATEVALUE(Went_to_Ready_to_Ship_Date__c)), 'Closed Before Expiration', IF( (License_Start_Date__c = SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.EndDate + 1) && (SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.EndDate + 1 < DATEVALUE(Went_to_Ready_to_Ship_Date__c)), 'Closed After Expiration With Back Billing', IF( (License_Start_Date__c = DATEVALUE(Went_to_Ready_to_Ship_Date__c)) && (DATEVALUE(Went_to_Ready_to_Ship_Date__c) > SBQQ__RenewedContract__r.EndDate + 1), 'Closed After Expiration Without Back Billing', '' ) ) ) ), '' ) )
CustomField.label: Renewal Type
